SIG - GPIO5

name: Touch Swich

name: LED

name: DS18B20
info:
Sensore: DS18B20

Sensore temperatura GPIO:
 - GND -> GND in alto a sinistra
 - SIG -> GPIO4
 - VCC -> 3v3


Nodi:
 - node-red-contrib-sensor-ds18b20
 - node-red-contrib-ds18b20-sensor

fnCode:
import RPi.GPIO as GPIO

DO = 17
GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
GPIO.setup(DO, GPIO.IN)
rain = GPIO.input(DO)


rain = 0 if rain else 1

node.globals["rain"] = rain


return msg
